message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
Set<String> windowHandles = driver.getWindowHandles();
Iterator<String> iterator = windowHandles.iterator();

String firstWindowHandle = iterator.next();
String secondWindowHandle = iterator.next();

driver.switchTo().window(firstWindowHandle);
driver.get("http://www.lifehacker.com");

driver.switchTo().window(secondWindowHandle);
driver.get("http://www.google.com");
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Iterator.next() method to iterate through the window handles. The getWindowHandles() method returns a Set of Strings where each String is a window handle. You can use an Iterator to go through these handles. The next() method returns the next element in the iteration. You can use this to switch between windows.
